headline: Does ServiceNow’s 14% Slide in 2024 Signal a Shift in Market Expectations?
summary: If you’re eyeing ServiceNow and wondering whether it deserves a spot in your portfolio, you’re not alone. It’s always a little nerve-wracking deciding what to do with a stock that’s made headlines for both dizzying gains and recent pullbacks. Over the past three years, ServiceNow has delivered impressive growth, with shares up a substantial 143.5%. Long-term holders have certainly enjoyed the ride. However, if you zoom in to the past year, returns have flattened out at -1.9%. Even in 2024 so...

headline: Stifel Maintains Buy Rating on ServiceNow (NOW) Stock
summary: ServiceNow, Inc. (NYSE:NOW) is one of the Best Long Term Growth Stocks to Buy Now. On October 3, Stifel maintained a “Buy” rating on the company’s stock with the price objective of $1,200. The research firm highlighted solid Q4 Enterprise and Commercial pipelines, which are expected to support modest upside to fourth-quarter guidance. The firm also […]

headline: Confluent stock gains on report of potential sale amid AI-driven demand
summary: Investing.com-- Confluent Inc (NASDAQ:CFLT) shares rose 14% in early trading on Wednesday following reports from Reuters that the company is exploring a potential sale after drawing interest from technology companies and private equity firms.
